name: Switch (itch) (Tipyx)
description:
Everytime you jump, the red and blue blocks swaps.

Will you reach the end of the awesome... 3 levels? :p

You probably notice it: there is a lack of almost everything in my game. I spend too much times in building the structure of the game and I really do a bad management of my time (long time since my last game jam!). So, consider it more as a prototype than a full game :).
